root: ^I guess my mastress told you about me, right?
^It's a female master. She is my dear mastress and keeper of this temple. A soothsayer she is, as well. She can interpret dreams too. And she…
^I got it i got it. She is an amazing being. So, your goddess asked you to accompany me just to make sure i am an uzu or whatever.
^So do you have a place in mind to venture forth?
^Let me see… You know there are a few abandoned ships in the docks. I heard rats are all around the place. We can go there and see what happens.
^Fine for me. I will inform when I am ready.
^So who are you really? What do you do here?
^I am a servant of this temple and the apprentice of Minami the Soothsayer. I am a Water Mage too, still at novice level though. My mastress said I can become an expert soon enough if I…
^Forget your mastress for a while now. Tell me how you ended up here?
^Well… I was just a young kid living in the slums. One day milady approached me and wanted me as an errand boy in the temple. To help her out with the maintenance and cleaning…
^Why? There is no one else doing that?
^No one! The Temple of Shalulu was rusty and abandoned until she came here. Now we have three priests, two errand boys and me.
^Sounds interesting I guess. So that's it then? This is the life for you now.
^Yes and I am very happy dear Abbas.
^You are so kind with the choice of your words and your intonations. Maybe too nice for a man?
^I try to be gentle to whomever. This is who I am.
^Right. If anyone tries to mess up with you, I bet you would splash the water right on their face.
^(laughs pretty hard) You are so funny.
^Certainly, I am. I will inform you when I am prepared to depart. Additionally, may I count on you if I decide to explore some place else?
^Sure why not? I have my provision but I might need some share and items as a friendly gift, hehe!
^Oh you are all same! How opportunist you are!
^I am sorry! I didn't want to hurt your feelings. Ok then I will come for free if I am not mingled with temple business.
^I am joking man. Of course you will get your share. For now, stay tight!

knotName: ^This is the content of the knot.
